price: „Fleht nicht um Hilfe heute, denn euch wird von Uns nicht geholfen.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
